fortishield-clusterd
==============

The fortishield-clusterd program manages the Fortishield cluster communications between the managers belonging to the cluster and synchronizes all files.


fortishield-clusterd options
----------------------

  +---------+----------------------------------------------------+
  | **-h**  | Display the help message.                          |
  +---------+----------------------------------------------------+
  | **-d**  | Run in debug mode. Use twice to increase verbosity.|
  +---------+----------------------------------------------------+
  | **-f**  | Run in the foreground.                             |
  +---------+----------------------------------------------------+
  | **-r**  | Run as root. Use only for debugging purposes.      |
  +---------+----------------------------------------------------+
  | **-V**  | Print version.                                     |
  +---------+----------------------------------------------------+
